title: Gypsy Rose Blanchard explains Munchhausen mom's murder & the odd disappearance of Courtney Roland
itunes:title: Gypsy Rose Blanchard explains Munchhausen mom's murder & the odd disappearance of Courtney Roland
description:
Gypsy Rose Blanchard is talking again about her involvement in her mom's murder. Dee Dee Blanchard, 48, suffered from Munchhausen syndrome by proxy, a mentalcondition marked by a caregiver making up illnesses in a child to win attention. Speaking from prison where she is serving a 10-year-sentence, Gypsy Rose describes how her mom chained her to a bed and what it was like hearing her die. Nancy Grace discusses the case with psychologist Dr. Chloe Carmichael, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan, and reporter John Lemley, RadarOnline.com reporter Alexis Tereszcuk joins Nancy to discuss the odd disappearance of Courtney Roland. The Texas journalist was found disoriented, unaware of a search for her.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
